entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 7:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or rain. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near noon. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 then light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
